tool.name: SeedListGenerator
tool.description: Generates seed lists for feature detection.

param.name: param_use_peptide_mass
param.label: [idXML input only] Use the monoisotopic mass of the best peptide hit for the m/z position (default: use precursor m/z)

tool.help:
**What it does**
Generates seed lists for feature detection.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_SeedListGenerator.html
